title: Movie Night: The Secret Life of Trees
description: An engaging documentary exploring how trees communicate and support ecosystems.

title: Story Hour: The Clever Little Fox
description: A lively storytelling session with sound effects and participation.

title: Art Workshop: Watercolor Gardens
description: Learn watercolor basics and paint a sunny garden scene.

description: Practical, evidence-based reading strategies to support young readers.

title: Movie Night: Little Inventors
description: Animated shorts about young problem solvers and their bright ideas.
